name: Valavorex
description: Enter the body of Thera the Blue, a Rune Knight in the City of Flowers. A great threat descends on the city and you're the one in charge of dealing with it. An  army of dragon kin advances and is trying to get into the walls to cause the fall of the city. Will you command the battle in the city's favor? Or will you cause the fall of one of the last cities in Understone. Your choices matter and will allow you to get one of 3 possible endings (or an additional sub-ending). Fight along side the defenders and try to protect the city to the best of your ability!
